com.illumina.basespace

Interface BaseSpaceConfiguration


  • public interface BaseSpaceConfiguration
    Configuration information for a BaseSpace session. These values are necessary to perform authentication and form the URIs necessary to communicate with BaseSpace via REST API
    Author:
    bking

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getAccessToken()
      Allows for pre-authorization.
      String getAccessTokenUriFragment()
      Get the URI fragment for requesting an access token
      String getApiRootUri()
      Get the root URI for the BaseSpace API
      String getAuthorizationScope()
      Get the desired authorization scope of the session
      String getAuthorizationUriFragment()
      Get the URI fragment for requesting authorization code
      String getClientId()
      Get the client ID generated by BaseSpace for an application
      String getClientSecret()
      Get the client secret for the client ID
      String getProxyHost()
      Get the name of the proxy host for BaseSpace requests
      int getProxyPort()
      Get the proxy port
      String getVersion()
      Get the desired version of BaseSpace to operate against

        Get the desired version of BaseSpace to operate against

      • getProxyHost

        String getProxyHost()
        Get the name of the proxy host for BaseSpace requests
        Returns:
        the name of the proxy host, or null if not using a proxy

        int getProxyPort()
        Get the proxy port
        Returns:

        Get the URI fragment for requesting authorization code

      • getAccessToken

        String getAccessToken()
        Allows for pre-authorization. If present, SDK will not initiate OAuth workflow for obtaining an access token
        Returns:
        the access token the SDK should use for the session
